text: The Cadillac DTS is a full-size luxury sedan made by Cadillac, the luxury brand of General Motors. It was produced from 2005 to 2011. The DTS was the largest sedan in Cadillacâ€™s lineup and was known for its luxury features like leather seats, a premium sound system, and a navigation system. The car had a V8 engine It also came with modern safety features like airbags and stability control. == Markets == The Cadillac DTS in all its production was mainly sold in North America with limited sales outside North America. == Discontinuation == In 2011, the Cadillac DTS was discontinued and replaced by the Cadillac XTS. The company decided to stop making the DTS due to people buying more small luxury sedans and SUVS. == References == Category:Sedans Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles DTS
title: Cadillac DTS
